title: Apex Domain
body: When you place the site on the command line, it is a common configuration such as setting an SSL certificate in the load balancer and specifying EC2 in the target group. In this configuration, add CNAME records to the domain DNS record and write the DNS name of the load balancer. However, if you want to set a load balancer for Apex Domain ( `kemu.site` for this site), you can not add CNAME records. The IP of the load balancer is variable, and it is not recommended to act that may be changed due to restart, and there is a way to fix the IP of the load balancer, but it is costly. global Global Accelerator blogs- global- ac)rator.s blog- by=item.additionalFields.createdDate&blogs- global- ac)rator.s)- order=desc&aws- global- ac)rator- wn.s)- by=item.additionalFields.postDateTime&aws- global- ac)rator- wn.s)- order=desc) For this reason, we use the function of the A record alias of Route 53.
